email_text:
Subject: Successful Sign-In Notification for your Microsoft Account

Dear [User],

We are writing to inform you that a successful sign-in was detected on your Microsoft account from a new location. 

Location: [City, Country]
IP Address: [XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX]

If you did not perform this sign-in, we recommend that you review your recent account activity and take appropriate action to secure your account. You can review your recent sign-in activity by visiting your account security settings.

If you have any concerns or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team.

Thank you for choosing Microsoft.

Sincerely,
Microsoft Security Team
